data.message: Implement threat model and 5/8 safety invariants: Created threat model v1.1 with asset-first structure, 7 threats, 5 attacker models. Implemented S1 (credentials), S3 (network exfil), S5 (governance), S6 (destructive bash), S7 (git force) as hookify rules. All tested and working. Remaining: S2 (sink scrubbing), S4 (prod break-glass), S8 (telemetry).
data.task: Implement threat model and 5/8 safety invariants
data.outcome: Created threat model v1.1 with asset-first structure, 7 threats, 5 attacker models. Implemented S1 (credentials), S3 (network exfil), S5 (governance), S6 (destructive bash), S7 (git force) as hookify rules. All tested and working. Remaining: S2 (sink scrubbing), S4 (prod break-glass), S8 (telemetry).
